inclusion.criterion: Healthy Caucasian, Hispanic, or Asian women between the ages of 21-45.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Group 1: Postpartum (singleton pregnancy) women who are exclusively breastfeeding,
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Group 2: Postpartum (singleton pregnancy) women who are non-lactating,
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Group 3: Controls - Healthy, non-pregnant women who are race and age-matched to the breastfeeding women in group one.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subjects with cardiac, hypertensive, vascular, renal (serum creatinine of > 1.5), pulmonary, endocrine, musculoskeletal, hepatic, hematologic, or malignant or rheumatologic disease will be excluded from the study.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Smokers and those with a history of significant alcohol or drug abuse are excluded.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Baseline hypertension (systolic BP > 160 mm/Hg) or hypotension (systolic BP < 90 mm/Hg).
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Subjects taking any chronic medications except stable doses of thyroid hormone, prenatal, vitamin supplements, or oral contraceptives.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Those who have received any investigational drug in past 90 days will be excluded from the study.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Women who are currently pregnant will be excluded from the study.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Women who became pregnant by in vitro fertilization IVF or any hormonal manipulation (i.e. fertility drugs such as clomid) are also excluded, as they may have an altered pre-pregnant hormonal state.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has Paget's disease of bone and is being treated with Bisphosphonate. Their sister had the same problems.
